        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_RESOURCES_PROPERTY_NAME
        A property key holding the default location of additional resources (stopwords, etc.) for algorithms. The location is resolved relative to es/conf but can be absolute. By default it is ..
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_COMPONENT_SIZE_PROPERTY_NAME

        public static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_COMPONENT_SIZE_PROPERTY_NAME
        A property key with the size of the clustering controller's algorithm pool. By default the size is zero, meaning the pool is sized dynamically. You can specify a fixed number of component instances to limit resource usage.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
